chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: What's up guys, you are in the 11th video of the Sigma Web Development course.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: We have completed 10 videos.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So one like is enough for the consistency of all of us.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: In today's video, we will see about Semantic Tags.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Because they are very important for SEO.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And to understand the structure of the overall website,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: search engines are very happy to see this structure.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: That is, overall SEO of your website is going to be very good if you use these tags.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: What are these tags? Why are these tags?

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: How to use them?

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: What are the benefits? We will see in this video.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Let's roll the intro.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Intro

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So guys, I would like to tell you what are Semantic Tags?

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Here you can see that I have made a folder named Video 11.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And here I have set an index and HTML boilerplate template.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: I have set an H1 and I am going to preview it by setting this image here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So this is the image.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: To explain a little, I will tell you what are Semantic Tags?

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Semantic Tags are for browsers and web crawlers

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: who want to understand your website properly.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: They tell them what is the content of your website

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: and what is the purpose of which place and which tag.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: If you do not use Semantic Tags in HTML,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then your work will be done.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: It is not that if you do not use Semantic Tags,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then your website will not look good.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: You can do good designing.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: But we want to explain to Google and Bing search engines

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: about our website.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And if we explain them about our website,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then they will be able to understand our website.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And they will rank our website on Google, Bing,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: and respective search engines.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And we want the crawlers to understand our website.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And we want whoever wants to understand our website,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: to understand it well.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: That's why there are some special tags.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Like header, nav, main, article, figure.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: All these special tags are made in HTML

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: which help in structuring your website.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Now if there is something in the header,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then I know that it is a header.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: That is, it is at the top.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: If there is something in the footer,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then I will understand that the website has started ending from here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: This footer started here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: This footer could also be div.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: But no, if I am using Semantic HTML,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then I will use the footer tag.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Along with that, where I am in the span tag,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: I was making my navigation bar.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: This time I will not make my navigation bar in the span tag.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: I will make my navigation bar in the nav tag.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So these kinds of differences

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: explain our search engines very well

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: about what our website is about.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So I will show you some examples of semantic tags here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And I hope you understood what semantic tags are.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Now see, there are download folders like our computer.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Many of you must have a download folder

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: that I don't know, all the files in the world have come in it.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: 90% of the files in your computer

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: are in the download folder of many people.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: But we should not do this.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Some people go to such an extent

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: that they start spreading files in their local disk C,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: in the windows folder.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And some people keep files in system 32 too.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So if you spread your files in your computer,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then definitely it is not arranged in one way.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: But if you arrange it in folders,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: that you have this file in one folder.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: If you want to keep a secret file in a folder,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: you put secret files.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: You can make a folder called do not open disk.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: If you can put some of your files in it,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then it will be arranged in one way.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: You have arranged images in one way,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: you have arranged videos in one way,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: and let's say you have arranged e-books in one way.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So whenever you go to find it, you will get it.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So it will be much better for you to understand

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: that folder structure instead of

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: if you are spreading your files throughout the computer.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: You definitely don't want to spread your files

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: throughout the computer.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So I hope you understood this thing

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: that why we use semantic tags.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: It is very good for our SEO.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: I have not used the word SEO yet.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: But SEO, a very important part of search engine optimization

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: is to use semantic tags.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So what happens?

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Basically, I make your website the way you make it.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: You just use some special tags.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: For example, let's say I am making this website.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: What will I do now? I will comment this image here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: I will not comment this semantic tag.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: What I will do here is I will make a navbar.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So what I will do?

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: First of all, I will say that this is the header of my website.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: I have used a header tag.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: I will make a nav in it.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: In this, I will make an unordered list.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: I will make an li in it.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And I will write home here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And after this, let's say I am writing a lot like this.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And this is my header like this.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So anyone who comes to my website will understand

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: that this is my header.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Home, about, contact, whatever I want to write,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: I can write it here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So this is my header, this is my navbar.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: This is clearly visible because I have used header and nav tags.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So I write about here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And I write contact here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So I wrote home here, I wrote about here,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: and I wrote contact here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So I hope you understood this thing.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Now if I want a footer, let's say I want to make a footer.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Here my main content will come after the header.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So I will use the main tag.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And after this, my footer,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: in footer, let's say I write copyright CWH.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And I write here, all rights reserved.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Okay, I can write like this.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So here, see copyright, all rights reserved,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: I wrote all this here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Did I, yes, so what I will do is,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: I will cut this, I will put it in the main,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: this is my main content.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So first my header will come, then main content will come,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then footer will come, as you can see here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And here too, you see, here is this header,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: this is my main content, this is footer.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So what I did in one way is, I arranged it.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: In a way, the way you arrange your files,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: in different folders, I arranged my HTML tags here.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So we understood about the header tag,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: that it is used to represent the top section of a webpage,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: which is the header.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Then after this, we put nav,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: which is in the navigation menu on our page,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: so we will put that in the nav tag, ideally.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Article indicates a self-containing piece of content,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: such as blog post or news article.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: If you put a particular self-contained piece of content,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then put it in the article tag.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Section represents a thematic grouping.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: That is, suppose one section is talking about one thing

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: of your page, then the other section will talk about

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: something else.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Aside, aside means if anything is on the side,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then it uses the aside tag.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So here, see, typically used for sidebars or content

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: that is tangentially related to the main content.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Like what you can do on the aside tag,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: that you have to put a side note,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: you have to put about the author,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: you must have seen many blogs,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: in which side is also written about the author.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So you can put such things from the aside tag.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Then after this we have the footer tag.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: I told you about it.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: If you want to put copyright information,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: or if you want to put some important links

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: of the website, then you can put that

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: in the footer.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Then after this, figure and fig caption.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: What is figure and fig caption?

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Whenever you want to use images, diagrams, charts,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: you can use figure and fig caption.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: In the main, the main content area,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: like the main content area of our page was this,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: we put it in the main tag.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Then there is also a time tag,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: which is time related information.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So you can use the time tag,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: you can put date, time or anything in it.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So I hope you understood this thing.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So these are used to enhance SEO,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: to improve accessibility.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And if the browser

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: wants to take a decision

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: about any of our page,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: let's say there is a browser,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: it has a new feature,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: that it will read our content aloud.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Like there is a feature in the edge.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So the browser can decide that

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: read aloud is being done.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Now think about it, if someone wants to read aloud this page,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then how will he read aloud?

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: You don't want to read aloud like this.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: You want the main content to be read.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: HTML, semantic tags,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: HTML5 introduced, arrange,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: semantic tags and so on.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: The first versions of our HTML,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: they did not have semantic tags.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Semantic tags were introduced from HTML5.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: And the most important reason

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: to introduce semantic tags in HTML5

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: is to arrange things.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So that the browser

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: or the content that is being parsed,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: which is also looking at the code of our content,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: whether it is a browser, crawler,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Google, Bing, search engines,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: or anyone wants to generate a preview,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: like you put a URL on Twitter,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: so it wants to generate a preview.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: If there are such things,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then you will want your content

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: to be understood well.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: So if you want your content to be understood well,

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: then you will use semantic tags.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Here this image is explaining very well

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html

chunks.text: Don't be confused,

chunks.text: this is not used for styling.

chunks.text: Because many people are confused

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: that aside tag is used to aside things.

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: Semantic tags are made only for accessibility

chunks.title: semantic-tags-in-html
chunks.text: and to understand your page.

text: What's up guys, you are in the 11th video of the Sigma Web Development course. We have completed 10 videos. So one like is enough for the consistency of all of us. What are these tags? Why are these tags? How to use them? What are the benefits? We will see in this video. Let's go to the computer screen. Let's roll the intro. I have set an H1 and I am going to preview it by setting this image here. So this is the image. To explain a little, I will tell you what are Semantic Tags? Semantic Tags are for browsers and web crawlers who want to understand your website properly. They tell them what is the content of your website and what is the purpose of which place and which tag. If you do not use Semantic Tags in HTML, then your work will be done. It is not that if you do not use Semantic Tags, then your website will not look good. You can do good designing. But we want to explain to Google and Bing search engines about our website. And if we explain them about our website, then they will be able to understand our website. And they will rank our website on Google, Bing, and respective search engines. And we want the crawlers to understand our website. And we want whoever wants to understand our website, to understand it well. That's why there are some special tags. Like header, nav, main, article, figure. All these special tags are made in HTML which help in structuring your website. Now if there is something in the header, then I know that it is a header. That is, it is at the top. If there is something in the footer, then I will understand that the website has started ending from here. This footer started here. This footer could also be div. This time I will not make my navigation bar in the span tag. I will make my navigation bar in the nav tag. Article indicates a self-containing piece of content, such as blog post or news article. If you put a particular self-contained piece of content, then put it in the article tag. Section represents a thematic grouping. That is, suppose one section is talking about one thing of your page, then the other section will talk about something else. Aside, aside means if anything is on the side, then it uses the aside tag. So here, see, typically used for sidebars or content that is tangentially related to the main content.
